data.title: Broken Angels by Richard Morgan
data.meta_description: Broken Angels (GollanczF.) by Morgan, Richard K. and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Condition: Good. SHIPS FROM USA. Used books have different signs of use and do not include supplemental materials such as CDs, Dvds, Access Codes, charts or any other extra material. All used books might have various degrees of writing, highliting and wear and tear and possibly be an ex-library with the usual stickers and stamps. Dust Jackets are not guaranteed and when still present, they will have various degrees of tear and damage. All images are Stock Photos, not of the actual item. book.

Original Wraps. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: No Jacket ( as Issued ). First Edition. An uncorrected UK proof ( Advanced Reader's Copy ). This is a bright, clean copy without previous ownership inscriptions. The covers are fresh and unfaded. There are no creases to the spine, which is solid, unfaded and intact. The pages and closed page edges are clean. The binding is solid - no cracked hinges or loose pages. Given the fragility of proof copies, this is in very nice condition. Paypal accepted.

Soft cover. Condition: As New. 1st Edition. First UK PROOF Edition, First Printing. This true first edition, first printing (first impression) published in limited numbers, uncommon proof edition and especially so in fine condition, the authors second novel.

Full Leather. Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: No Dust Jacket. Keith Birdsong (illustrator). First Edition. Copyright is 2003. 366 pages. Signed in name only on the signature page. Full green leather covers with gilt stamped lettering and decoration. Raised spine bands. All edges are gilded. Silk moire end leaves and sewn in book mark. Un-used Easton Press "The Signed First Editions of Science Fiction" book plate, along with the publisher's notes and certificate of authenticity are laid in. There are a couple of small and shallow scuff seen in the gilded edges of the text block. Volume is otherwise Fine. Signed by the Author.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. No Jacket. 1st Edition. A very scarce title in any condition, this copy is in Fine condition. Number 238 of Only 900 Signed Copies! The front and back covers are both in terrific condition and the gilded page edges show only very minor wear (see pictures of all sides). There is light residue on the second page. This book is personally signed by the Author and comes complete with a Certificate of Authenticity and Collector's Notes. It would be a beautiful addition to your Easton Press collection. Signed by Author(s).

First edition. Octavo, boards. Signed by Morgan on the title page. The second book in the Takeshi Kovacs series where he is a mercenary involved in suppressing an uprising on another planet. He is approached to be involved in a shady scheme involving recovery of archeological artifacts. "Here, Morgan has nicely expanded the scope of his series, giving a detailed look at the chaotic hodge-podge that interstellar discovery has turned a small section of the galaxy into, along with the Milosevic-like bureaucrats and soldiers jockeying for position in it. Occasionally overdosing on world-weariness, but nevertheless a thrilling cyberpunk actioner." - Kirkus review, 2003. [Reference: Broderick and Di Filippo, Science Fiction: The 101 Best Novels, 1985-2010 #69]. Some age darkening to text paper, a fine copy in a fine dust jacket. (20801).

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. Limited Edition. Signed Limited Edition (this being #282 of 500); A Fine book in a Fine dust jacket, as new and unread. A pristine copy of this Subterranean Press edition of the follow-up to "Altered Carbon", basis for the fine mini-series. Not remaindered, not price clipped, not ex-library; in a protective Mylar sleeve and will ship carefully wrapped in a sturdy box. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. First Edition. Richard K Morgan - Broken angels - First U.K. hardback printing - Gollancz 2003. Fine jacket priced £17.99. Fine boards - sharp spine and corners - very bright and clean. Contents would be fine apart from usual page edge browning common with this book - however there is a water stain on top of book block which has bled through about half an inch on some pages. Have tried to show in picture but hard to see. Book is signed on title page by author. Morgan's second book - the Altered carbon series on Netflix has seen prices rise to 400 for this book in fine condition.p. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. First Edition. Broken Angels by Richard Morgan (First UK Edition) Altered Carbon Sequel A tight bright unread copy. A sharp bright dust jacket. Not price-clipped. First published in Great Britain in 2003 by Gollancz. Sequel to his fantastic novel Altered Carbon. BOOK.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. First Edition. The second Takeshi Kovacs novel, the sequel to Altered Carbon. First edition (first printing, with no indications of later printings). A fine copy (page block beginning to tan, as usual) in a fine dust jacket. Signed by the author on the title page.

Hardcover. Condition: As New. Keith Birdsong(Frontispiece Illustrator) (illustrator). First Edition. Broken Angels by Richard K. Morgan (Easton Press) Limited Signed A pristine copy. Still sealed in the publisher's original shrink wrap, and in the original Easton Press shipping box - opened to verify contents. From the library of sci-fi author Greg Benford. Signed Limited Edition. Signed by the Author on the limitation page. Limited to 900 copies. Full green leather with decorative gilt, all edges gilt, bound-in silk ribbon place marker. Easton Press Signed First Edition Series. BOOK.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Fine. Desert Isle Design (Jacket design); Vincent Chong (illustrator). 1st Edition. First edition, limited to 500 signed and numbered copies, this being #420. Signed by Richard K. Morgan directly on the colophon page. Book and dust jacket in fine, as new condition. A Takeshi Kovacs novel and sequel to Altered Carbon. Signed by Author(s).
